int DSA_do_verify (  const unsigned char *    dgst,
int    dgst_len,
DSA_SIG *    sig,
DSA *    dsa
) 
 

Verifies that a signature matches a given message.

Parameters:
dgst  Input Message
sig  signature to be verified
dgst_len  Length of the input message
dsa  Public key for the signature

int DSA_verify (  int    type,
const unsigned char *    dgst,
int    dgst_len,
const unsigned char *    sigbuf,
int    siglen,
DSA *    dsa
) 
 

Verifies DSA Digital Signature.

Parameters:
type  Not supported as of now
dgst  Text for which signature needs to be computed
dgst_len  Length of the message
sigbuf  Signature data
siglen  Length of the signature
dsa  DSA structure obtained from oct_dsa_generate_parameters() and oct_dsa_generate_key() with keys filled in
Returns:
Success: 1 Failure: 0
